title: Nigerian delegation chief Ayokunle Ibrahim hails CSPOC, calls for ‘concrete guidance’ on AI
Sadiq Khan warns AI could become ‘weapon of mass destruction of jobs’
description: The Labour politician highlighted the significant threat the burgeoning technology poses to the capital's workforce.

title: Grok blocked from undressing images with AI in places where it's illegal, X says
description: Elon Musk's AI chatbot Grok won't be able to edit photos to portray real people in revealing clothing in places where that is illegal, according to a statement posted on X.

title: Predictive AI Bridges the Security Response Gap in Automated Attacks
description: According to the World Economic Forum’s Cyber Risk in 2026 outlook, artificial intelligence (AI) is expected to be the most consequential factor shaping cybersecurity strategies this year, cited by 94% of surveyed executives as a force multiplier for both defense and offense. The report,...
